data.name: Devolve
data.text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
data.flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

data.name: Dan Emmons
data.text: Battlecry: Design \na solution \n (wherever it is).

data.name: Drakkari Defender
data.text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
data.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

data.name: Electra Stormsurge
data.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
data.flavor: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

data.name: Elemental Destruction
data.text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5)
data.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

data.name: Far Sight
data.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
data.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

data.name: Feral Spirit
data.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
data.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

data.name: Healing Rain
data.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
data.flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

data.name: Healing Wave
data.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
data.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

data.name: Hex
data.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

data.name: Hot Spring Guardian
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #3_Health.
data.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

data.name: Ice Breaker
data.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
data.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

data.name: Lava Burst
data.text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
data.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

data.name: Lightning Storm
data.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all_enemy minions. Overload: (2)
data.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

data.name: Mana Tide Totem
data.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
data.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

data.name: Powermace
data.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
data.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

data.name: Primal Talismans
data.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
data.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

data.name: Spirit Echo
data.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
data.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

data.name: Tuskarr Totemic
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
data.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

data.name: Unbound Elemental
data.text: Whenever you play a card_with Overload, gain_+1/+1.
data.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

data.name: Ancestor's Call
data.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
data.flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

data.name: Avalanche
data.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
data.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

data.name: Call in the Finishers
data.text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
data.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

data.name: Charged Hammer
data.text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
data.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

data.name: Draenei Totemcarver
data.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
data.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

data.name: Dunemaul Shaman
data.text: Windfury, Overload: (1)\n50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
data.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

data.name: Fireguard Destroyer
data.text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
data.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Flamewreathed Faceless
data.text: Overload: (2)
data.flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

data.name: Hex
data.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
data.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

data.name: Jade Lightning
data.text: Deal $4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
data.flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

data.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Restore #6 Health.\nOverload: (1)
data.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

data.name: Lotus Illusionist
data.text: [x]After this minion attacks\na hero, transform it into a\n_random 6-Cost minion.
data.flavor: If you think her Illidan and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

data.name: Master of Evolution
data.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
data.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

data.name: Rumbling Elemental

data.flavor: He's a very hungry elemental.

data.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
data.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
data.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

data.name: Stasis Elemental
data.text: Battlecry: Freeze a minion until this leaves the battlefield.

data.name: Storm Chaser

data.flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

data.name: Thunderhead
data.text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush.
data.flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

data.name: Tidal Surge
data.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

data.flavor: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

data.name: Wicked Witchdoctor
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic_Totem.
data.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.

data.name: Windspeaker
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
data.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

data.name: Bloodlust
data.text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
data.flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

data.name: Doomhammer
data.text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
data.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

data.name: Earth Elemental
data.text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
data.flavor: Nothing beats rock.

data.name: Hallazeal the Ascended
data.text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
data.flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

data.name: Hammer of Twilight

data.flavor: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

data.name: Megafin
data.text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with random Murlocs.

data.name: The Storm Guardian
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Thrall, Deathseer
data.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
data.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

data.name: Thrall, Deathseer
data.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.

data.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
data.text: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
data.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

data.name: Volcano
data.text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions.\nOverload: (2)
data.flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

data.name: Voodoo Hexxer
data.text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
data.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

data.name: White Eyes
data.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle\n'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
data.flavor: My life for Aya!

data.name: Windshear Stormcaller
data.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
data.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

data.name: Eureka!
data.text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
data.flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

data.name: Fire Elemental
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
data.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

data.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
data.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
data.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

data.name: Master of Realities
data.text: [x]After you summon a minion,\n transform it into a random\n minion that costs (2) more.

data.name: Moorabi
data.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
data.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

data.name: The Mistcaller
data.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
data.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

data.name: Thing from Below
data.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
data.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

data.name: Bogshaper
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your_deck.
data.flavor: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

data.name: Everyfin is Awesome
data.text: Give your minions +2/+2.\nCosts (1) less for each Murloc you control.
data.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Greater Sapphire Spellstone
data.text: Summon 3 copies of a friendly minion.

data.name: Jade Chieftain
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
data.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

data.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
data.text: (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

data.name: Neptulon
data.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
data.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

data.name: Stone Sentinel
data.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
data.flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

data.name: The Storm Bringer
data.text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
data.flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

data.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
data.text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
data.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

data.name: Hagatha the Witch
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
data.flavor: Curse-bringer, tree-twister, mother of wretched things…Hanzo main.

data.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, cast an\nElemental Invocation.
data.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

data.name: The Runespear
data.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
data.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

data.name: Shudderwock
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
data.flavor: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

data.name: Snowfury Giant
data.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
data.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!
